description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

main_features: Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing with push notification services
Comprehensive developer services including onboarding, testing, release, and maintenance
Get important information through Documentation, Support Center, and Announcement page

sections.name: Benefits of using Shopee Open API?
sections.content: Provides quick access to shop data for product, order, and campaign management across all markets

sections.name: Who can access Shopee Open Platform?

notes: This appears to be an introduction/overview page rather than a specific API endpoint documentation. It contains general information about the platform, its benefits and target users. No specific API endpoints or parameters are documented on this page.
